title: Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor (Patlabor: The Mobile Police)
synopsis: As the human race evolves, so does its technology. Engineers have successfully created robots dubbed "Labors" for mass distribution, utilized by society for a number of everyday tasks. However, there are criminals who manage to get their hands on these Labors, using them for their own nefarious means.
related_anime: ['Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor: Reboot', 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor the Movie', 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor', 'Kidou Keisatsu Patlabor: On Television']
